mapper.select: select groups_members.id from groups_members left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where accounts.email_address = #{accounts.emailAddress} and (groups_members.group_id = #{groups.id} or groups_members.account_id = #{groups.accountId})

select groups_members.id ,groups.group_name as groups_group_name ,accounts.user as accounts_user from groups_members left join `groups` on groups_members.group_id = groups.id and (groups_members.account_id != groups.account_id or groups_members.account_id is null) left join accounts on groups_members.account_id = accounts.id where groups.id = #{id}
select user from accounts left join `groups` on accounts.id = groups.account_id where groups.id = #{id}
